original_text:
To the woman he said,
“I will surely multiply your pain in childbearing;
    in pain you shall bring forth children.
Your desire shall be contrary to your husband,
    but he shall rule over you.”
korean_text: 또 여자에게 이르시되 내가 네게 임신하는 고통을 크게 더하리니 네가 수고하고 자식을 낳을 것이며 너는 남편을 원하고 남편은 너를 다스릴 것이니라 하시고

sentences.original_text: I will surely multiply your pain in childbearing;
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너의 잉태하는 고통을 크게 더하리라

sentences.original_text: in pain you shall bring forth children.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 고통 중에 자식을 낳을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Your desire shall be contrary to your husband,
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 소원은 네 남편에게 반항하려 할 것이나

sentences.original_text: but he shall rule over you.”
